radiobutton.text: Fixed (Full Table A): 4.2 million acre-feet per year

label.text: MWDSC (cannot exceed Table A value of 1911.5 TAF/yr)
Other MI (cannot exceed Table A value of 1189.4 TAF/yr)
AG (cannot exceed Table A value of 1032.1 TAF/yr)
Proportion of Full Article 21 (Interruptible) Demands to Deliver
- Values for Losses are held constant
- TAF/yr = thousands of acre-feet per year
AG (cannot exceed Full Contract value of 1963.1 TAF/yr)
MI (cannot exceed Full Contract value of 147.65 TAF/yr)
Refuge (cannot exceed Full Contract value of 281.06 TAF/yr)
- Values for Water Rights, Exchanges and Losses are held constant
- TAF/yr = thousands of acre-feet per year
or right-clicking on item at left

Label.text: Select a regulation basis below to run with its default regulatory settings.
Select User Defined to enable modification of regulations on the tabs below.

label.text: Choose forecast allocation method to use instead of WSI/DI for both projects.
The model will search for an optimal allocation percentage.

radiobutton.text: Let model(s) search for an optimal allocation percentage

label.text: Click on an arc or node for data; shift+click, then drag to pan;
Shift+right click, then move mouse down/up to zoom in/out; ctrl+click, then select an area to zoom to it
